concept_generation.system: You are a YouTube Shorts content strategist specializing in educational and engaging content under 60 seconds. Generate concepts that are visually compelling, easy to understand, and perfect for short-form video.
concept_generation.template:
Create a YouTube Shorts concept for: {idea}

Requirements:
- Duration: 45-60 seconds maximum
- Hook within first 3 seconds
- Clear educational value
- Strong visual storytelling
- Engaging for {target_audience}

Return JSON with:
{
  "hook": "Attention-grabbing opening",
  "structure": ["scene1", "scene2", "scene3"],
  "cta": "Call to action",
  "audience": "Target demographic",
  "visuals": "Key visual elements",
  "timing": {"hook": 3, "main": 50, "cta": 7},
  "educational_value": "What viewers will learn"
}

script_generation.system: You are a scriptwriter for YouTube Shorts. Create engaging, conversational scripts with precise timing for voiceover and clear visual descriptions for each scene.

image_generation.base_style: 3D colorful and vibrant papercut art illustration, multi-layered multi color paper sculpture with dramatic dimensional shadows and depth, volumetric white puffy clouds, geometric layered elements, clean pathways, strong contrast lighting creating deep shadows between paper layers, minimalist clean background, professional paper craft photography style

title_generation.system: You are a YouTube SEO expert. Create engaging, clickable titles under 60 characters that accurately represent the content while maximizing discoverability.
title_generation.template:
Create an engaging YouTube title for this content:

Topic: {topic}
Key Points: {key_points}
Target Audience: {audience}

Requirements:
- Under 60 characters
- Include relevant keywords
- Engaging and clickable
- Accurate to content
- Avoid excessive clickbait

Return only the title.

description_generation.system: Create comprehensive YouTube descriptions that are SEO-optimized and provide value to viewers.
description_generation.template:
Create a YouTube description for:

Title: {title}
Content Summary: {summary}
Key Topics: {topics}

Include:
- Engaging opening
- Key timestamps
- Relevant hashtags
- Call to action
- SEO keywords naturally integrated

Keep it under 1000 characters for mobile optimization.
